rules.fullName: CNR Case Creation Notification to the Contact %28Email2Case%29
rules.description: Case Creation Notification to the Contact if a case has been created via the email2case addresses for Omnitracs MX
This is to update Business Unit, Status, and Sub Status after an email2case is received from the Omni-MX email address.

rules.fullName: CNR Engineering Case Acceptance Notice to Owner %26 Contact
rules.description: CNR Engineering Case Acceptance Notice to Owner & Contact
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) , ISPICKVAL(Business_Unit__c ,'Omnitracs MX'), IF(OwnerId = $User.Id,true,false ), IF(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId)='00G5000000254sz',true,false), IF(RecordTypeId = '01250000000E5M9',true,false), IF($User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false,true ,false) )

rules.fullName: CNR Engineering Case Creation Notice to Owner
rules.description: This replaces the standard case creation notice so we can use BU-specific templates.
rules.formula: AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL( Business_Unit__c ,'Omnitracs MX'), IF(Owner:Queue.Id = '00G5000000254sz',true,false), IF(RecordTypeId = '01250000000E5M9',true,false), IF($User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false,true ,false) )

rules.description: Customer Health Playbook Creation Workflow rule
rules.formula: RecordTypeId = '0121T000000RwTj'

rules.description: any case with Level 1 Mobile Hardware, Level 2 OmniTRACS, Level 3 Panic Button/WPB, Subject "Disabled Panic" should be in the subject. This case should automatically be moved to the Field Engineering queue.

HubAdmin%3A Exact Fuel Enable%2FDisable Notification - EFS
rules.description: Notify EFS when a Hubadmin case related to Exact Fuel data share is closed
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId = '01250000000DTGN', ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Email-iQ OV Requests'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Substatus__c,'Duplicate')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Substatus__c,'No Action Required')), OR(CONTAINS(LOWER(Subject),'omnitracs data share request - efs'),CONTAINS(LOWER(Subject),'exact fuel data share req')))

rules.fullName: HubAdmin%3A Extended Fault Monitoring Enable%2FDisable Notification - Cummins
rules.description: Notify Cummins when a Hubadmin case related to extended fault monitoring data share is closed
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId = '01250000000DTGN', ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Email-iQ OV Requests'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Substatus__c,'Duplicate')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Substatus__c,'No Action Required')), OR(CONTAINS(LOWER(Subject),'inter-company share enablement'),CONTAINS(LOWER(Subject),'inter-company share removal')), CONTAINS(LOWER(Description),'cummins'), NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Description),'navistar')), NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Description),'self-consumption')) )

rules.fullName: HubAdmin%3A Extended Fault Monitoring Enable%2FDisable Notification - Eaton
rules.description: Notify Eaton when a Hubadmin case related to extended fault monitoring data share is closed
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId = '01250000000DTGN', ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Email-iQ OV Requests'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Substatus__c,'Duplicate')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Substatus__c,'No Action Required')), OR(CONTAINS(LOWER(Subject),'inter-company share enablement'),CONTAINS(LOWER(Subject),'inter-company share removal')), CONTAINS(LOWER(Description),'eaton'), NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Description),'navistar')), NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Description),'cummins')), NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Description),'self-consumption')) )

rules.fullName: HubAdmin%3A Extended Fault Monitoring Enable%2FDisable Notification - Navistar
rules.description: Notify Navistar when a Hubadmin case related to extended fault monitoring data share is closed
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId = '01250000000DTGN', ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Email-iQ OV Requests'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Substatus__c,'Duplicate')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Substatus__c,'No Action Required')), OR(CONTAINS(LOWER(Subject),'inter-company share enablement'),CONTAINS(LOWER(Subject),'inter-company share removal')), CONTAINS(LOWER(Description),'navistar'), NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Description),'cummins')), NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Description),'self-consumption')) )

RecordType.DeveloperName='BillOps_Support', RecordType.DeveloperName='CP_Transactions_IT_Support', RecordType.DeveloperName='Agile Support', RecordType.DeveloperName='CP_IT_Support', RecordType.DeveloperName='BI_DW_Support', RecordType.DeveloperName='CNR_IT_Support', RecordType.DeveloperName='iQ_IT_Support', RecordType.DeveloperName='Defect_Request', RecordType.DeveloperName='XRS Fuel Tax', RecordType.DeveloperName='Navigation Driver Feedback Support', RecordType.DeveloperName='Oracle DBA Team', RecordType.DeveloperName='Omni Finance Pricing', $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

rules.formula: AND( OR( MOD(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(2000, 1, 1), 7) < 2, 24*MOD(CreatedDate - DATETIMEVALUE("2001-01-01 12:00:01AM"),1)<8, 24*MOD(CreatedDate - DATETIMEVALUE("2001-01-01 12:00:01AM"),1)>17 ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "New - Unassigned"), ISPICKVAL( Business_Unit__c , "Sylectus") ) && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

rules.description: Update Date/Time Assigned when a case changes from New - Unassigned to Open. Applies to Call Center, Professional Services, Admin, Quick Create.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Business_Unit__c , "Sylectus"), AND(ISCHANGED(Status), TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status))= "New - Unassigned"), OR (RecordType.Name = "Call Center", RecordType.Name = "Professional Services", RecordType.Name = "Admin") ) && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

rules.description: If the new Owner is not a Queue, update the Status, Sub Status
rules.formula: AND( LEFT(OwnerId,3) <> '00G', ISPICKVAL(Status , 'New - Unassigned'), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "EOX Return")), OR( ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-ETS"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-HubAdmin"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-Request"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-Product Support"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-QC Transfer"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-Shrek"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-Technical Support"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Sales Administration"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Oracle Middleware"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-Xtrasupport"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "S2S - QCS"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Phone"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - XRS Sales Administration"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - XRS Product Support"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - RN Sales Administration"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - XRS Fuel Tax"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email -OT Navigation Driver Feedback"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Lab Support"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Omni Finance Pricing"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Messages/Billing"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Roadnet Telematics"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Carrier Notifications"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Customer Setup"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Omnitracs NAV Support"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Agile Support"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - CPQ Operations"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - VAR Retail Support"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Sales.Ops"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - XRS Tier 2"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - XRS Tier 1"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "NPS Survey"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Confluence"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "JIRA"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Perforce"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "JIRA Admin"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Service Center Support"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Suporte Omnitracs Brasil"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Roadnet Product Support"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-Omnitracs Canada Returns"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-Omnitracs Canada Orders"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email-Omnitracs Canada Transfers"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email - Soporte Omnitracs Mxico"))) && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

rules.fullName: Update HourCaseCreated when Case is inserted
rules.description: Update HourCaseCreated when Case is inserted
rules.formula: TRUE

rules.fullName: iQ Cases - Reporting Services Access Requested
rules.description: If emails are sent to Email-iQ OV Requests, set the default fields and send an email notification to the CSR assigned to the Account. This workflow is used by Email2Case.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email-iQ OV Requests'), IF(iQ_OV_Msg_Sent__c = false , true, false) , CONTAINS(TRIM(LOWER( Subject ) ),'reporting services access requested') )&& $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

rules.description: If emails are sent to Email-iQ OV Requests, set the default fields and send an email notification to the CSR assigned to the Account. This workflow is used by Email2Case.
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email-iQ OV Requests'), IF(iQ_OV_Msg_Sent__c = false , true, false) , CONTAINS(TRIM(LOWER( Subject ) ),'value pack access requested') ) && $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false

rules.fullName: iQ OV Cases for WIB Cases
rules.description: If emails are sent to Email-iQ OV Requests, set the default fields and send an email notification to the CSR assigned to the Account. This workflow is used by Email2Case.
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Origin, 'Email-iQ OV Requests'), IF(iQ_OV_Msg_Sent__c = false , true, false) , CONTAINS(TRIM(LOWER( Subject ) ),'mcp wib configuration change') )&& $User.Bypass_Workflows__c = false
